Package dog.giraffe.cluster

Class ClusterColors

    • dog.giraffe.cluster.ClusterColors

extends java.lang.Object
    Assigns colors to clusters.

      • colors

        public abstract java.util.Map<Vector,​Vector> colors​(java.util.List<java.util.List<Vector>> clusters,
                                                          Points points)
        Assign distinct colors to all the centers in clusters.

      • dimensions

        public abstract int dimensions()
        Returns the number of components the colors chosen will have.

      • falseColors

        public static ClusterColors falseColors​(int blue,
                                        int green,
                                        int red)
        Assigns RGB colors to centers. The colors are generated by splitting the [0, 2*PI] interval to equal parts and assigning the endpoints as hues to centers. It will try to match the hue of the colors to the hue of the centers.
        Parameters:
        blue - the channel of the input image that is considered to be the blue component
        green - the channel of the input image that is considered to be the green component
        red - the channel of the input image that is considered to be the red component

      • falseGrays

        public static ClusterColors falseGrays​(int dimensions)
        Assigns gray colors of any dimension to centers. The grays are generated by splitting the [0, 1] interval to equal parts and assigning the endpoints to centers. It will try to match the intensity of grays to the intensity of the centers.
